mainHero.title: Welcome to
mainHero.subtitle: MediLogs.
mainHero.description: Bridging the Gap in Healthcare by Creating a Unified Ecosystem Connecting Patients, Doctors, and Clinical Labs - Enabling Full Patient Control of Medical Histories and Empowering Data-Driven Healthcare Decisions.

items.title: Integrated Healthcare Ecosystem
items.description: MediLogs revolutionizes healthcare management by providing a unified platform where patients, doctors, and clinical labs can effortlessly interact. Our comprehensive ecosystem supports real-time sharing of medical histories, diagnostic reports, and treatment plans across the healthcare continuum.

items.title: Smart Automation and Personalization
items.description: Our smart appointment scheduling system allows patients to book visits effortlessly, aligning with doctor and lab availability to reduce wait times and improve service delivery. Tailored recommendations help patients connect with the right specialists based on their symptoms and location, ensuring optimal care.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
